mapper.insert: insert into order_payment_t (PAYMENT_ID, PAYER_ID, RECIPIENT_ID, AMOUNT, CHANNEL, `STATUS`, CREATE_TIME, SEG1, SEG2, SEG3, SEG4, SEG5, SEG6, SEG7, SEG8, SEG9, SEG10, SEG11, SEG12, SEG13, SEG14, SEG15, ORDER_ID ) values (#{paymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recipientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update order_payment_t set PAYER_ID = #{payerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECIPIENT_ID = #{recipientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEG1 = #{seg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG2 = #{seg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG3 = #{seg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG4 = #{seg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG5 = #{seg5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG6 = #{seg6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG7 = #{seg7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG8 = #{seg8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG9 = #{seg9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG10 = #{seg10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG11 = #{seg11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG12 = #{seg12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG13 = #{seg13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG14 = #{seg14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEG15 = #{seg15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PAYMENT_ID = #{paymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select PAYMENT_ID, PAYER_ID, RECIPIENT_ID, AMOUNT, CHANNEL, `STATUS`, CREATE_TIME, SEG1, SEG2, SEG3, SEG4, SEG5, SEG6, SEG7, SEG8, SEG9, SEG10, SEG11, SEG12, SEG13, SEG14, SEG15, ORDER_ID from order_payment_t where PAYMENT_ID = #{paymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select PAYMENT_ID, PAYER_ID, RECIPIENT_ID, AMOUNT, CHANNEL, `STATUS`, CREATE_TIME, SEG1, SEG2, SEG3, SEG4, SEG5, SEG6, SEG7, SEG8, SEG9, SEG10, SEG11, SEG12, SEG13, SEG14, SEG15, ORDER_ID from order_payment_t
